# mongodb manual

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mongodb-manual
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mongodb-manual
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mongodb-manual
mongodb-manual <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mongodb-manual
mongodb-manual <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
